name: Dan-Gun
meaning: Dummy data for the Dan-Gun pattern used for development and testing.

moves.title: Low Block
moves.description: Step into a walking stance towards 12:00 and perform a low block with the left arm.

moves.title: Middle Punch
moves.description: Step forward to 12:00 with the right foot and execute a middle punch with the right fist.

moves.title: High Block
moves.description: Turn to face 3:00 and perform a high block with the left arm.
